forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 3. Wind chill values as low as -12. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 18. Wind chill values as low as -13. Northwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As night wraps Boston in a chilly embrace, the air is crisp and carries the bite of winter, reminiscent of silent streets dusted in frost. At twilight, the low hum of city lights flickers against an almost celestial backdrop. Though the sky is partly cloudy, offering only a fleeting glimpse of stars, the truth lies in the frigid temperatures that keep the heart of the city palpably alive. With wind chill values that dive daringly low, dressing in layers becomes a necessity—thick coats, mufflers, and well-insulated gloves will all be allies against the sharp northwest breeze that dances through the streets.

As dawn approaches, the sun promises a mostly sunny day, casting a gentle warmth that belies the underlying chill. Even so, morning walks should be taken cautiously; while the spirit of a bright day may beckon you out, the ambition of the sun's rays won't entirely extinguish the cold. A day spent in Boston could be well enjoyed with a hot cappuccino in hand as you wander the city's historic paths or perhaps a spontaneous visit to a cozy café inviting you to soak in the ambiance as the city stirs to life. The whir of daily hustle will echo around you, and you might find solace in its rhythm, despite the lingering chill.
